name: Kiwi Cooler
description: Sweet kiwi is accented with the slightly licoricey flavor of tarragon in this easy gin cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 1 ripe kiwi, peeled and cut in half
3/4 ounce fresh lime juice, from 1 large lime

recipeInstructions.text: Add kiwi and tarragon to mixing glass and muddle until kiwi is liquified, about 30 seconds. Add gin, lime, and simple syrup. Fill mixing glass with ice and shake until well chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into ice-filled glass, top with seltzer and stir gently before serving, garnished with a tarragon sprig.
